nodes.text: Ilsa was a female Human who was the daughter of a farmer named Jon, and together they lived on Dantooine.

In 3956 BBY, she was killed by Mandalorians. Her father called upon the Jedi to seek revenge for his daughter's murder, and the call was answered by Revan, at that time studying as a Padawan under his programmed identity. Revan helped avenge her death by killing all Mandalorians in the area, and their leader.
